<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156961</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156961</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2945</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The English Global Village</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Englische Globale Dorf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Village Global Anglais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Vila Global Inglesa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Villaggio Globale Inglese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το αγγλικό σφαιρικό χωριό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Aldea Global Inglesa</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An Educational Portal for EFL English Studies, includes activities, games and projects for students, and lesonplans and other information for teachers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">educational topics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">activities</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein pädagogisches Portal für EFL Englisch 
studiert, schließt Aktivitäten, Spiele und Projekte für 
Kursteilnehmer und lesonplans und andere Informationen für Lehrer 
ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un portail éducatif pour l'anglais d'EFL 
étudie, inclut des activités, des jeux et des projets pour des 
étudiants, et des lesonplans et toute autre information pour des 
professeurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um portal educacional para o inglês de EFL 
estuda, inclui atividades, jogos e projetos para estudantes, e 
lesonplans e a outra informação para professores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un portal educativo per l'inglese di EFL studia, 
include le attività, giochi ed i progetti per gli allievi e 
lesonplans ed altre informazioni per gli insegnanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια εκπαιδευτική πύλη για τις αγγλικές μελέτες EFL,
περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες, τα παιχνίδια και τα προγράμματα 
για τους σπουδαστές, και lesonplans και άλλες πληροφορίες για 
τους δασκάλους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un portal educativo para el inglés de EFL 
estudia, incluye las actividades, los juegos y los proyectos para los 
estudiantes, y los lesonplans y la otra información para los 
profesores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pädagogische Themen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktivitäten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sujets éducatifs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activités</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tópicos educacionais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atividades</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">soggetti educativi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attività</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαιδευτικά θέματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δραστηριότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">asuntos educativos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">actividades</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <typicalAgeRange>
